sources.title: The Carriage Driver Doroshkechi (1971)
sources.description: Title: The Carriage Driver - Doroshkechi (1971) Directed by: Nosratallah Karimi Date of birth: 23 December 1925, Tehran, Iran Date of death: Writing credits: Nosratallah Karimi Music: Mojtaba Mirzadeh Year: 1971 Country: Iran Language: Farsi Color: Black & White Runtime: 90 min.
